pages.text: $Magan is not an Essence in the traditional meaning. It is much more a blend of primal essences and $Mana, a manifested version of arcane energy.

That's why crafting it is so ridiculously easy, as one will only have to mash those 6 essences together. $(br)$(item)Magan Essence$() is usually used in $(marked)Applied Soulogy$(), though it can also find use in other disciplines.
